class="cmti-10">International Journal of Speech Technology, </span>Springer, 2011 (joint
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~padman/pubs.html']


     first-author paper.)
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~padman/pubs.html']


     </li></ol>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~padman/pubs.html']

<title>Dr. Ramesh Oruganti &lt;&lt; IIT Mandi</title>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<h2 class="page_heading"> Dr. Ramesh Oruganti </h2>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<div id="data_top"><img src="images/ROruganti.jpg" height="200px" alt="Dr. Ramesh Oruganti" />
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<td>ramesho[at]iitmandi[dot]ac[dot]in</td></tr>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<th>Address: </th>	<td>School of Computing and Electrical Engineering </td>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<td>01905-237993</td></tr>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Ph.D, Virginia Tech, (1987) - Electrical Engineering</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>M.Tech, IIT Madras (1972)  - Electrical Engineering</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>B.Tech, IIT Madras (1969) - Electrical Engineering</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<div class="data_field" align="justify">
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<ul><li>Visiting Professor, IIT Mandi (29th January 2013 onwards).</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>R&D Consultant - (July 2010-Jan 2013).</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Senior Visiting Fellow, UNSW, Australia (July 2007 to May 2008).</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Associate Professor/Senior Lecturer, NUS, Singapore (1989-2010).</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>R&D Engineer, Corporate R&D, Schenectady, USA (1987-89).</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Prior Experience: BHEL, Bangalore, Best & Crompton Engineering Ltd, Madras & IIT, Madras.</li></ul>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<div class="data_field" align="justify">
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<ul>Senior Member, IEEE, USA</ul>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<div class="data_field" align="justify">
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<ul>My current research interest is in the area of power electronic applications in renewable electrical energy systems and, in particular, in solar photovoltaic energy systems. The areas which I have been working on together with my students and collaborators over the years are<br><br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<ul><u>Efficient and high performance DC-DC power conversion</u><br><br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Resonant & soft-switched power converters</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Power converter analysis and modeling</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Synchronous rectifiers for efficient low d.c. output voltage power conversion</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Voltage regulator modules for high performance computing applications</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Fast dynamic boost / buck-boost power converters</li></ul><br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<u>AC to DC power converters for improved power quality </u><br><br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Efficient single phase power factor correction schemes for computer and other power supplies</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>High performance three phase pulse-width modulated power converters and their control</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Conducted EMI noise and mitigation in a.c. to d.c. power converters</li> </ul><br><br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<ul><u>High-performance stand-alone and grid-connected inverters for renewable energy and other applications</u><br><br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Fast response control of inverter with excellent output voltage quality under linear and non-linear loads </li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Novel PWM techniques to solve the time delay problem in inverters for obtaining greater output voltage</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Resonant power conversion schemes for grid connected fuel cell systems</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Topologies and control schemes for single-stage ac modules for solar photovoltaic systems</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


</ul><br><br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


Several of these power electronics related topics are also very relevant in electrical systems for renewable energy applications including solar photovoltaic systems.  Developing economical schemes capable of excellent performance in terms of efficiency, life and control performance will continue to be a major challenge in the introduction and acceptance of renewable electric energy systems. <br><br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


Lastly, as we are all aware, mankind's addiction to cheap and convenient energy sources and carriers has created a global crisis which only promises to worsen with time. The problems as well as the possible mitigations and solutions straddle numerous disciplines, such as, science, engineering (including the field of power electronics), economics and policy. People with different domain expertise have opportunities to collaborate and contribute in this critical area.
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<div class="data_field" align="justify">
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']

<h3>Research Funding</h3>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<h5>As the Principal Investigator or as the Major Contributor:</h5>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>"Improving the Performance of Active Power Factor Correction Scheme" Funded by M/s. Nemic Lambda (S) Pte Ltd - 2005~2007. Funding S$180000. </li> 
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>"Dynamic Voltage Restorer System for Power Quality Improvement" University Research Project - 2000~2003. Funding S$50600. </li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>"Power Quality Improvement Using Artificial Intelligence Techniques" University Research Project - 2001~2004. Funding S$73786. </li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>"Three Phase AC-DC Converters for Improved Power Quality" University Research Project - 2001~2006. Funding S$68100. Collaboration with University of Victoria. </li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>"New Generation Power Supply Development" together with M/s. Nemic Lambda (S) Pte Ltd - 1991~1994. Funded by the National Science and Technology Board. The research has resulted in a patent and also an advanced DC-DC converter module being introduced by Nemic Lambda in their product range. </li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<h5>As Collaborator</h5>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>"Universal Power Electronic Cell" University Research Project - 2000~2004. Funding S$68600. Collaborator.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']

<h3>Research Accomplishments</h3>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>First Prize paper - IEEE Transactions on Power Electronics in 2000 for the year 1999 (with Liang, YC & Pan, H).</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Invited paper (with Srinivasan, R) in the "Special Issue on Recent Advances in Power Electronics and Drives", Sadhana, Indian Academy of Sciences, December 1997. </li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>A conference paper (with Phua, CH) included in the IEEE Press Book, "Power Electronics Technology and Applications", 1996.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>A conference paper (with Lee, FC) included in the IEEE Press Book, "Modern Power Electronics", 1992.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Two conference papers (Part I & Part II) (with Lee, FC) together were awarded the first prize of the Static Power Converter Committee at the IEEE-IAS-1984 annual meeting.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Fast response 'Optimal Trajectory Control' method proposed for a series resonant power converter has been adopted by GE-Medical (and possibly by other medical imaging equipment manufacturers) for controlling power in their Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) equipment.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Patent: R Oruganti, CH Phua and J Tan, "DC-DC Converter", Japanese Patent: 2751961 (1998). This is still used by the company in one of its DC-DC converter product line.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']

<h5>Professional</h5>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<ul><li>Was instrumental in starting the series of IEEE Power Electronics and Drive Systems (PEDS) Conferences together with other interested professionals in Singapore. Was the Organizing Chairman for the first PEDS'95 in Singapore. After the second PEDS conference, also in Singapore, a PEDS Management Committee was set up in Singapore under the IEEE Singapore Section in order to promote and manage the IEEE-PEDS conferences in the region. This conference is now an important Power Electronics Conference in IEEE's annual calendar.
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Invited member of Program Committee (Power Electronics) of the 2003 IEEE Industrial Electronics Society Annual Conference (IECON'03) and other conferences.
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Invited Organizing Committee member of the 2002 IEEE Power Electronics Specialists Conference (PESC'02)
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


Co-associate editor of the IEEE Press Book, "1996 Power Electronics Technology and Applications" under the IEEE Technology Update Series.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Technical Committee Member for the 1994 and 1996 IEEE Power Electronics Specialists Conferences.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Member of the EV panel set up by the National Science and Technology Board in 1994.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Chairman, Power Electronics Study Panel set up by NSTB / 1994-95.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']


<li>Short courses: 1) Switch-Mode Power Conversion & 2) Solar Photovoltaic Energy Systems .</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~ramesho/']

<h2 class="page_heading"> Dr. Dileep A. D. </h2>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<img src="images/dileep5.png" alt="pic here" border="0" height="220px" width="170px"/>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<th>Phone: </th>   <td>+91-1905-300047</td>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<th>EMail:  </th>	<td>addileep[at]iitmandi[dot]ac[dot]in</td>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<tr><th></th><td>Room No 12, 2nd Floor, A3 Building,</td></tr>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<tr><th></th><td>IIT Mandi, Kamand Campus, Kamand - 175005</td></tr>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>Pattern Recognition</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>Kernel Methods for Pattern Analysis</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>Machine Learning </li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>Speech Technology</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>Computer Vision</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai </br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep', 'http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~anil/']


Thesis title: Matching based Dynamic Kernels for Classification of Varying Length Patterns of Speech 
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>M.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai  </li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering from Rural Engineering College, Bhalki, Gulbarga University, Karnataka   </li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai </br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


Project Officer: April 2012 - December 2012
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai </br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


Project Associate: June 2006 - December 2006
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


Department of Computer Science and Engineering, N.M.A.M. Institute of Technology, Nitte, Karnataka </br>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


Lecturer: September 2001 - August 2004
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']

<h5>Papers published/accepted in refereed journals</h5>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, GMM based intermediate matching kernel for classification of varying length patterns of long duration speech using support vector machines, accepted for publication in <em>IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems</em>, November 2013.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, Class-specific GMM based intermediate matching kernel for classification of varying length patterns of long duration speech using support vector machines, <em>Speech Communication</em>, vol. 57, pp. 126-143, 2014, DOI:http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.specom.2013.09.010.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, HMM based intermediate matching kernel for classification of sequential patterns of speech using support vector machines, accepted for publication in <em>IEEE Transactions on Audio, Speech and Language Processing </em>, vol. 21, no. 12, pp. 2570-2582, December 2013, DOI:10.1109/TASL.2013.2279338.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>A. D. Dileep and C. Chandra Sekhar, Speaker identification using pyramid match kernel based support vector machines, <em>International Journal of Speech Technology</em>, vol. 15, no. 3, pp. 365-379, September 2012.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']


<li>S. Swapna, A. D. Dileep, C. Chandra Sekhar, and Sri Kant, Block cipher identification using support vector classification and regression, <em>Journel of Discrete Mathematical Sciences and Cryptography</em>, vol. 13, no. 4, pp. 305-318, August 2010.</li>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~addileep']

<title>Dr. Samar Agnihotri  &lt;&lt; IIT Mandi</title>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~samar/']


<h2 class="page_heading">Dr. Samar Agnihotri  </h2>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~samar/']


<div id="data_top"><img src="images/samar.jpg" height="200px" alt="Dr. Samar Agnihotri" />

<h3>For Prospective Students</h3>
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~samar/']


<!-- <b>Prospective Undergrad Summer Interns:</b> During the coming summer, I am not offering any undergrad internships. Therefore, please do not contact me for this.
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~samar/']


<br><br> -->
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~samar/']


<b>Prospective Graduate Students:</b> I am always interested in working with motivated students who have strong mathematical reasoning skills and an interest in one or more of the following: information theory, wireless communications, optimization, computer networks, and algorithms. If interested, then contact me with your detailed CV and a write-up (no more than two pages) on a research problem/area of your interest, clearly mentioning why it is important, what work/results already exist, and how do you think you can contribute to it.
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~samar/']


Information Theory, Wireless Communications, Optimization Theory, Computational and Communication Complexity
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~samar/']


Relay networks, Analog network coding, Device-to-device communication, Communication architectures for smart-grids, Distributed compression and computation, Wireless sensor and ad-hoc networks
['http://faculty.iitmandi.ac.in/~samar/']
